reference.title: Deleting XDCR Replications
reference.shortdesc: To delete an XDCR replication, use the DELETE /controller/cancelXDCR HTTP method and URI.

section.title: Description
section.p: When a replication is deleted, it stops replication from the source to the destination. If the replication is re-created the between the same source and destination clusters and buckets, XDCR resumes replication.

section.title: HTTP method and URI
section.p: Replication ID is provided in the form of [UUID]/[local-bucket-name]/[remote-bucket-name]. It needs to be URL-encoded before it can be used in the delete replication URL.

section.title: Example
section.p: A URL-encoded endpoint is used which contains the unique document ID that references the replication. The replication can also be deleted via the web console.
